feed.title: IBM TRIRIGA Assistant
feed.subtitle: TRIRIGA Assistant is an AI chatbot powered by the IBM Watson Assistant Service. It offers a brand new experience for employees to engage with their workplace services. It allows employees to make room reservations, report issues or lookup people using natural language.

entry.title: Welcome to v1.04!
entry.content:
In this update we explore the possibilities of analytics with IBM TRIRIGA Assistant

ToDo: get more info here

Release notes updates here
entry.summary: In this update we explore the possibilities of analytics with IBM TRIRIGA Assistant
